page.title: 04LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content:
RAF camp buildings have been demolished. There is a small village hall and social club at the bottom of the village, a shop and the school.
Leisure activities vary in different parts of the village. On the council estate many of the men fish and both men and women play darts. Most of the homes have television and many have video recorders. A number of people go either to the social club or local public houses and some garden. The village has both football and cricket club and a youth club meets every week at the school.
